charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_1101_010:
This is the story of when Professor Oak and
[Name:PlayerNickname ] first met Mew.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_0401_040:
I’m checking out all the sync pairs gathered in
the Pokémon Center.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_0402_060:
Don’t you fret. I had plenty of different Pokémon
to study. It was quite enjoyable, hardly a wait
at all.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_1201_070:
But going out exploring is a surefire way to find
even more interesting Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_1201_080:
Hm! I’m so excited, I don’t believe I’ll be able to
sit around much longer. What do you say we get
going, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_0301_090: Do you have a partner Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_0401_100:
Of course I have a partner Pokémon! Have a look
at my faithful partner!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_0302_110:
What kind of Pokémon is
your partner?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_0402_120: Well asked! This is my partner Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_1101_130: Professor Oak sent out his Nidorino!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_1201_140:
What do you think? With Nidorino by my side,
no one can say we aren’t a sync pair!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_1201_150:
With that settled, it’s time to do some exploring!
There’s no need to wait when there are new
sync pairs for us to meet.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_010: Hah! Could that be Professor Oak I see?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_020:
Indeed, I am that very same Professor Oak. Oh?
That head... Could it be?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_030:
I’m the hotheaded Blaine! I used to do Pokémon
research with Professor Fuji!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_040:
What luck! The accomplished Professor Oak will
surely understand what I have to say.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_050:
Actually, I spotted a strange Pokémon in this
forest not too long ago.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_060:
I’m certain the number one Pokémon researcher
might be able to discover that mysterious Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0301_070: What kind of Pokémon was it?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0401_080:
Hmm... Truthfully I didn’t get a very good look
at it. It disappeared as soon as I realized it
was there.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0401_090:
At any rate, it was a very mysterious Pokémon.
I don’t have all the evidence yet, but...I think it
could be a Mythical Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0302_100: Could it be a Mythical Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0402_110:
Hmm... There’s no conclusive proof yet, but I
agree that that is a possibility.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0402_120:
At any rate, the mysterious Pokémon disappeared
the moment after I first noticed it!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_130:
I’ve heard that there are no wild Pokémon on
Pasio. Which would mean...
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_140:
I’ve been looking into it on my own for a while
now, but this is fantastic! Professor! Please give
me a hand!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_150:
Leave it to me! What do you think about all this,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? Care to lend a hand?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0301_160: I’d like to see that Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0401_170:
Hoho! Then it’s time to check out a Pokémon that’s
never been seen on Pasio before! Let’s go!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0402_190:
Hoho! Then it’s time to check out a Pokémon that’s
never been seen on Pasio before! Let’s go!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_010:
Aw, man! My cover was totally blown thanks to
your Gengar, Granny.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_020:
For a youngster, you whine just like that old
geezer! It wasn’t Gengar’s fault at all!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_0401_040:
Heh, that’s right. Looks like we meet again,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_0402_060: That’s right! I’m Agatha, of the Indigo Elite Four!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_080:
That’s my line! What’s an old duff like you doing
way out here?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_090:
Hm. Well, we heard there was a strange
Pokémon around these parts. We decided
to look into it for ourselves.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_100:
Even on Pasio, it’s nothing but research and more
research with you. Feh! How irksome.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_110: What I mean is that this is Pasio!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_120:
This is where sync pairs battle in the PML to find
the strongest sync pair of them all.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_130:
You doddering old duff! Long ago you were a
great Trainer. Surely you must still feel some
passion for battle!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_140:
What’s more, you’ve got a partner Pokémon with
you! Do you really not feel anything?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_150:
She’s got a point, Gramps! We’re on Pasio, after
all. How about a battle?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_160:
I’d like to see just how good of a Trainer you are
for myself!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_170:
Seeing all the different sync pairs and their
passion for battling on Pasio has certainly
reminded me of the old days.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_180: But now is not the time for that.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_190:
Somewhere in this forest lurks a Pokémon that
shouldn’t be on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_200:
This is positively mysterious! Aren’t you even the
least bit curious?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_210:
Feh... You sure have become a boring
old researcher.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_220:
It seems I’ll just have to make you remember what
a real battle is like! Right here, right now!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_230:
Well, for a doddering old duff, you’ve still got
some fight left in you.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_240:
No kidding! You might even stand a chance in the
PML if you tried, Gramps!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_250: Oh! What was that just now?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_260: Don’t go making a fuss! There’s nothing there.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_0401_280:
Right. [Name:PlayerNickname ], let’s get a
move on!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_0402_300:
Right. [Name:PlayerNickname ], let’s get a
move on!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_020:
It...it can’t be. I never thought it’d be here,
of all places.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_030:
Hey, Gramps. Am I seeing this right?
Is that really...
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_040: Yes. There’s no mistaking it. That is Mew!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_050:
But why is it here on Pasio? Pasio shouldn’t have
any wild Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_060: Which means it’s someone’s partner Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_070:
We four aren’t the only Trainers on this island,
you know.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0301_080: What if it isn’t a partner Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0401_090:
Mew has been seen by only a very few people.
It’s referred to as a Mythical Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0302_100: What kind of Pokémon is Mew?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0402_110:
Mew is called a Mythical Pokémon. Few have
ever even caught a glimpse of it.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_120: What’s the problem, you old geezer?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_130:
Seems the great Pokémon Professor is speechless
and quaking in his shoes.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_150:
What’s going on? I’ve never seen Gramps like
this before.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_160: Really? I know that look quite well.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_170:
He gets overwhelmed with excitement and his
heart is truly touched when he comes across a
Pokémon that hasn’t been seen on Pasio before.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_180:
Oh ho! That’s quite the expression! It reminds
me of how you used to be back in the old days!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_190:
So, what are you going to do? Don’t tell me
you’re satisfied just with seeing Mew?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0302_220: Mew looks like it wants to play!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_240: You’re right. I guess it’s time I go all out.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_250: Not as a professor, but as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_260: I’m going to challenge Mew to a battle!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_270:
Talk about bottomless energy! Mew seems like it
could take on a whole crowd of opponents and
still want more afterwards!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_280:
More than battling, it looks like it’s just playing
and having fun!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_290:
Yes. Mew’s nature, its habits, and just about
everything about it are all shrouded in mystery.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_300:
However, having a battle with it has allowed me
to unravel at least one of those mysteries today.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_310:
Mew’s DNA is said to contain the genetic code of
every Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_320: It’s believed that that’s why it can use any move.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_330:
That’s why Mew used so many different moves in
our battle!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_340:
How was it? Did it fire up your passion as a
Trainer again?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0301_360: Maybe Mew wants to battle again?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0401_370: Hoho! Well, you certainly are a lively one, Mew!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0401_380:
If you want to battle so much, why not come
along with me, Mew?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0302_390: Mew looks like it wants to play more!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0402_400: Hoho! Well, you certainly are a lively one, Mew!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0402_410:
If you want to battle so much, why not come
along with me, Mew?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_430:
Hehe, Gramps! It’s just like you said. Mew wants
to go along with you!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_440:
Mew seemed really happy with how closely you
were studying its moves in battle.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_450:
Nice going, Mew! This way, Gramps has to take
part in the PML!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_460:
Seems I can’t afford to slack off now. I’ll need to
prepare if I want to beat you, Oak.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_470:
Mew... Do you really want to become my
partner Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0401_490:
I never thought this was how today was going to
turn out.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0402_510:
I never thought this was how today was going to
turn out.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_520: I suppose I’ll have to do my best!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_530:
Thanks to Mew, I was reminded of
just how fun Pokémon battles can be.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_540:
It might not be bad to enjoy a few more Pokémon
battles while we’re at it!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_550:
By the way, I’d like to ask something of you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_560: Would you mind putting us on your team?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_610:
Well then, I think we’d best get back to town for
some training! If we’re going to compete, we may
as well try to be the best!
